name: CbcDebug
brief:
Debugging utilities and test message handlers

CbcDebug: Contains debug memory allocation routines and test message handlers.

Features when CLP_DEBUG_MALLOC defined:
- clp_memory(): Memory debugging
- clp_malloc()/clp_free(): Custom allocation with tracking

Features when TEST_MESSAGE_HANDLER defined:
- MyMessageHandler2: Example custom message handler
- Demonstrates trapping and customizing Cbc messages
- Prefixes messages with "==" for identification

This file is primarily for testing and debugging purposes.
Production builds typically have neither macro defined.
